name: Escape Machine City: Airborne
description:
It has been two days since the once vibrant Air City went completely silent and now it seems to be flying on its own. All attempts to establish contact have failed. A squadron of the best pilots has been dispatched by Capitol City to investigate this sinister silence.

BRILLIANT PUZZLES

Solve diverse puzzles and riddles in this exclusive escape game!

BEAUTIFUL 3D GRAPHICS

Explore beautiful levels within a captivating game setting.

ATMOSPHERIC AUDIO

The custom soundtrack and ambient sounds complement each other for an immersive experience.
